website_summaries.verdict: The look of these hangers can vary, but they hold up well.
pros: Hangers are solid, sturdy, and won't snag clothing
Carved notches are ideal for hanging straps and keeping shirts from slipping
cons: The color of the hangers can vary even within the same shipment

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade to my closet
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. I upgraded from cheap plastic hangers and I've been very pleased with how they look and function. They are just the right size to get shirts on and off. I also ordered the matching coat hangers (with the bar for hanging pants). The coat hangers are slightly larger than these shirt hangers, so I use them only for coats and vests. Note that the color of the coat hangers is not a perfect match to the color of the shirt hangers, but it is close enough for me. My closet looks so much better with all of these matching wood hangers. I'm pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Brysky

customer_reviews.title: Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for shirts and t-shirts. I just wanted a more cohesive look for my closet. That being said though these hangers do feel on the cheaper side, but at the moment I don’t see any signs of woodboring insectcs or any major damage to the product. There are a few areas where the wood is knicked and isn’t smooth. The divets in the hangers on either side also vary in smoothness. Some are very smooth some of them are not. So be careful when hanging delicate clothing from those. All in all not a bad products and for bargain woof hangers I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Farquaad

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love to be organized and everything must look the same in my closet. I needed more wood hangers and when I could not find them locally I turned to amazon. So glad I did! These hangers look amazing. Love the dark color and the fact that they have a notch on each end so strap dresses don’t slide off the end! I have reordered these 3 times now because I am replacing all my other wood hangers with these! A must buy for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not top quality, but good value
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned - the stain on these hangers doesn't quite extend all the way across the bottom side (for the darker colored ones), and a few of them do have rough edges that can catch your clothes - will need sanding down. That said, the vast majority of them look and work great. At about $1 per hanger shipped, you can't really ask for much better. Dinged one star from the sloppiness, but still good value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Which was awesome because of what I'm using these for
customer_reviews.text: After mistakenly ordering the wrong hangers the first time, I came across these. The price was comparable to the last set, but I got a few more than my previous purchase. Which was awesome because of what I'm using these for. (Custom bridesmaids hangers for my wedding party). These hangers were not only affordable, they are of great quality. I have no doubt that my bridesmaids will be satisfied with the durability of these hangers. I may even switch all the hangers in my house to these because I love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory King

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, OK price.
customer_reviews.text: I like my wooden hangers. Only issue is that not all hangers are in best condition. There will be 1 or 2 that won't last the 1st couple of weeks. The metal hook dislodges and comes out. But the rest are pretty good. I've been using these for about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used these as wedding hangers. We engraved some and the wood underneath the stain is lighter, but not so light that the engraving was easy to read. So instead I used a cricut to make stickers. The hook on the top turns. Very sturdy. Absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri M.

customer_reviews.title: Not solid wood
customer_reviews.text: The product was chipped out of the box, and I could see the oak finish was a thin coating on what appears to be a very then plywood-ish material. I was disappointed as I purchased these for their aesthetic, but they are lightweight and they do look nice where they aren't chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Passed the return deadline
customer_reviews.text: I wish I was still able to return these hangers as many of them are broken. Only think hung on them were dress shirts. The quality of this product is definitely below average.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no problems at all.  Look great.
customer_reviews.text: The title pretty much says it all. I am super happy with these. I also bought a few with the pants bar and a few with the clips. All of them are great. It's about $1/hanger and you will keep these forever.
customer_reviews.author: Marc SantaCruz

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are very poor quality. Literally break with a shirt on them. I ordered 60 hangers and I am returning all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mari-lynn

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my entry closet and guest room (two different colours) they look fantastic hanging ready for use! The wood tones are lovely, and the bottom crossbar textured strip looks classy not a cheap afterthought. Price is so good I might splurge for my own closet!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Davidson

customer_reviews.title: but well made and designed hangers for a great price! They ended up being the perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but well made and designed hangers for a great price! They ended up being the perfect buy. I had purchased solid wood hangers many years ago for nearly three times the price and found it very difficult to tell the difference between them, aside from the color finish. I liked these enough I switched the old ones out and bought three more boxes of the Topline brand, in addition to buying 4 boxes of the Topline Pants/Skirt Clamp hangers. I would and have recommended them to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Very classy hangers as advertised. Sturdy & looks great with clothes rack I ordered with them. My son said it looks like a rack at Macy’s :)
customer_reviews.author: Orlando W

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice wooden hungers, look fine, had no problem using them, and they offer solid value.
customer_reviews.author: AP7

customer_reviews.title: Solid good looking hangars that help my shirts keep creased look ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid good looking hangars that help my shirts keep creased look after starch. Can hang in either direction. Have bought a lot to redo my whole closet with these hangars like them that much.
customer_reviews.author: gene perri

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: The hangers were described as 'curved' they are not. Unfortunately I order two boxes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kidney

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Needed more sturdy hangers for my clothes and this was the perfect product! I love how my clothes are all uniform and how they are organized in the closet now!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor J. Wong

customer_reviews.title: CONSTANTLY out of stock.
customer_reviews.text: I need a regular supply of the walnut hangers, both with and without pants bars. For a year now they can't keep them properly in stock. Please buy some larger quantities to sell!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cox

customer_reviews.title: Fancy
customer_reviews.text: Fancy and great quality but wish I would have got the ones with the pants bar at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Wood

customer_reviews.title: Really nice! I needed the hook to rotate so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! I needed the hook to rotate so I can hang my next day's outfit on the front of my closet, the notches on the arms to keep tops from sliding off, and a uniform look for my closet. These hangers do all three! My only complaint is that when nothing is hanging on the hangers, they don't all hang exactly level, but once I put clothes on them, they all even out. Really happy. Already ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought hubby a new wardrobe and he needed more hangers and he loves the wood ones. These are working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I love these hangers so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers so much! I need to order more, I use for my boutique they are high quality
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hall

customer_reviews.title: Don't just hang around...Order these Hangers NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hangers at a bargain price. Will definitely buy more. Fast shipping too!

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality
customer_reviews.text: I love wooden hangers but I had to sand three of these. They snagged some clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood hangers to add to my collections of over ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice wood hangers to add to my collections of over 200. I need to quit buying clothes and throw some away.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Needed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed... I loved these mahogany hangers originally, but I have since re-ordered twice and returned both boxes upon opening. They are TERRIBLE quality. The staining is uneven, where the hook joins the wood is uneven/unfinished, and the shoulder grooves are rough. I am going to find a different company now to order from.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Front closet hangers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my coat closet. The coats hang beautifully and the hangers look nice.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte newman

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not as good
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy with the quality- very light weight hangers
customer_reviews.author: GURPREET KAUR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought so I could cricut vinyl for my bridesmaids on the hangers and they held great!

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Bout them for hangers for my girls in my wedding!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: They are durable. Used them for bridesmaids dresses for my daughters wedding!
customer_reviews.author: obidioobispo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for decorating for a wedding party! They’re thick and light weight but very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany wagoner

customer_reviews.title: clothes
customer_reviews.text: these items successfully wear my clothes while in the closet without letting them fall to the ground. best feature is hanger changes directions so clothes can face the way you like without having to be put on hanger that way.
customer_reviews.author: chuckberry32

customer_reviews.title: ease of ordering
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. I make loomed flower coverings and the hangers are the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: carolee

customer_reviews.title: No Slip
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived quickly with no damage. I love these hangers blouses do not slip off and the color is wonderful, makes my closet look really organized. Love them so, have ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Zeva

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. Konmari'd my closet and these hangers make everything so much neater.
customer_reviews.author: Shani

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of the hangers. I like the look and feel of them and the shirts fit nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: BKelley

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked these hangers
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked these hangers, they're very sturdy and my clothes hang appropriately. My only disappointment was that the color I had to order did not match the ones I already own. My original color is much lighter than these but I don't find that color in shirt hangers anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly R Backlund

customer_reviews.title: Avoid These If You Need More Than One Box
customer_reviews.text: The stain applied to the hangers varied wildly from box to box. Noticeably different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Voros

customer_reviews.title: These are very sturdy hangers.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers came as expected and do what they should...which is hang your shirts. The look very nice and uniform in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Love these hangars
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangars! This is my second order. Was concerned initially about the color but they were perfect - more of a dark brown than a red.
customer_reviews.author: Tan and Glam

customer_reviews.title: Made the Gift Special
customer_reviews.text: Used for hangar for a robe as gift to bridesmaids. Sturdy, but not heavy. rich brown color.
customer_reviews.author: TJV

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sharp looking!
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and my closet finally looks organized and amazing.
customer_reviews.author: shockRmolar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was looking for and are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a way to organized my closet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a way to organized my closet and give it a professional feel. These wooden hangers did the trick. Simple cheap and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The quality is really amazing. I wasn't expecting this good of quality for under 20 bucks. Can't wait to hang up my clothes on these bad boys
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Mokdad

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: They're very pretty and well made. My clothes look better on these hangers than on me.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Some came scratched and I’m using these for my bridesmaids

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood hangers with a beautiful finish. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super nice quality .. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Sandleitner

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Nice color and durable. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price was good. The quality was good. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and reasonable price, will come back to the store again.
customer_reviews.author: J Wu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These hangars are well made a truly beautiful! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with them!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be happier with the hangers. At first look, I wondered if the "neck" might be too short, but that hasn't mattered at all. They are good looking, well finished, smooth and unblemished, and they fit on the closet rack and slide easily. Our clothes look good after hanging on them for quite some time. What else can I say? Oh yes, the price was very good as well! Strongly recommended. We'll be buying more as we trade out all our old hangers for them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy NiceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good Hangers; Cherry Color Has Changed
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are good hangers for the price. Of the three boxes I’ve ordered, I haven’t had any issues with quality. They have been smooth and a consistent color. Every so often I’ve had one with some nick or blemish but nothing that impaired the use. HOWEVER, if you are ordering the cherry color be aware it changed in the past 6-12 months. Amazon has not updated the pictures, still showing the dark cherry color. Actually Amazon has no idea it has changed, based on my interactions with customer service. I had to contact the company to verify. I’ve attached a picture of the original cherry (top) and the new, lighter cherry color.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Do not order these...
customer_reviews.text: Do not order these because you do not know what you're getting! I have ordered over 100 for my boutique and the ones I received recently are not the same quality as the first ones. They are very light and feel like plastic. Not happy at all. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: amya86

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Affordable Hangers for our Coat Closet
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews for wooden hangers on Amazon, I ordered these particular wooden hangers for our coat closet. I typically use plastic hangers for all my clothes, but reserve wooden hangers for coats. These are sturdy, yet thin, so they can hold our coats yet not take up too much room. They arrived all intact; none were broken. They also seemed well-made (at least so far). The wood was smooth with a glossy coating. There were no splinters to snag the clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered several sets of these hangars over the past year in an attempt to standardize our closets. I am impressed with the packaging and durability of these items - all at a very sweet price!
customer_reviews.author: MegBuckley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality wooden hangers, matte finish not glossy finish
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality wooden hangers, the walnut is a nice dark stain but not too dark. The hangers do arrive with a matte finish, not a glossy finish. They are smoothly sanded down and stained, just not glossy. You could polish them with a wood polish if you wanted a glossier look. Very nice quality hangers, they look good in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Not Solid Wood
customer_reviews.text: One of the hangers broke and I saw it is not made of solid wood. The hook is chrome, not brass. Very ugly. Return for refund
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality because of the finish. Sturdy, but rough in spots
customer_reviews.text: They are good hangers but need another coat or two of lacquer. The notches aren’t sanded and can pull your clothes...
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Super Shirt Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Seems funny to write a review of a hanger, but these are especially nice ones. They arrived packaged very well, and I didn't find a single rough spot on them that could snag a dress shirt, or blouse. I'd say they'd make an ideal gift for someone who has to dress up for work.
customer_reviews.author: Llamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to upgrade my closet to wooden hangers, I spent a lot of time looking at various options, and finally settled on these. Great choice. sturdy, clean lines, and look awesome holding my wardrobe. initally ordered the 20-pk, have since ordered another 30pk.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Look Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bout these hangers 3 times and they look great in my closet, very clean look. I actually have to but them again as I use them for my work shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Albright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect colour
customer_reviews.text: perfect dark colour I wanted for my husband's shirts they feel sturdy and none have broken with me so far even when they fall on the ground Worth every dollar!!!!
customer_reviews.author: floden

customer_reviews.title: Great little hanger
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I needed to finish redoing my closet. The color states dark cherry, but in reality it's just standard cherry color. A few of the hangers were a little rough and needed a light sanding.
customer_reviews.author: J. Broerman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I use these to engrave brides/wedding party names
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I use these to engrave brides/wedding party names, so it was super important that the wood be smooth so it wouldn’t snag and damage expensive dresses, and these delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hendren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hangers, smooth
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hangers, smooth, do not snag, but are wooden and sturdy. Have them in my hall closet for winter coats, and regular clothes as well and they do the job

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with these hangers. They are smooth and don't snag my clothes. The closet looks so much more organized.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Good solid hangers for my wife's clothes. The stain is consistent but flat, which may be good if that's look you like. I would like them to be slightly more shiny but that's just opinion. The wood is sanded smooth with no splinters and nothing split. Overall a good purchase and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: JVenkman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my closet needed!! They feel very sturdy and have an amazing smooth finishing color. These are inexpensive and great for my closet and shirts.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!

customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and for the last three months they have been great in my entryway closet . I have had no problems with them !

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional and well-built
customer_reviews.text: Simple, functional and well-built. I did not receive any broken hangers as others have.

product_meta.title: Topline Classic Wood Shirt Hangers - Mahogany Finish (20-Pack)
product_meta.description:
Color:MahoganyTopline Classic Wooden Shirt Hangers - Mahogany Finish (20-Pack) 

- Fulfilled by Amazon. Zero-risk, free returns.
- Strong construction, holds firm and won’t bend like cheaper woods and plastics.
- Rotating 360-degree hook.
- Smooth polished finish and chip-resistant.
- Rich decorative woodgrain.
- Detailed carved notches.
- No assembly required. Ready to hang your clothes right out of the box.
- Made from sustainable Hevea Wood.
- Individual Hanger Dimensions - 17.5 x 9 x 0.5 inches.
- Packaging Dimensions - 14 x 14 x 5.5 inches.


About Hevea:
- All-natural and eco-friendly, Hevea hardwood is one of the strongest and most durable woods in the industry.
- Superior grain density ensures that the wood never loses its integrity or shape.
- Non-toxic material means that it will keep your clothes clean and fresh.


About Topline:
- Our mission at Topline is to create a comfortable, healthy, clean, and serene home environment through rigorous product design and development.
- We strive to complement a home’s natural comforts with home-goods that elevate quality of life.
feature_bullets: Carved non-slip notches for increased functionality.
Also available in 10-Pack Shirt / 20-Pack Suit: Cherry, Natural and Walnut Finishes. (Check other listings)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars268 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
